title: Coordinated Bust of Dark-Web Dealers Yields 150 Arrests in U.S., Europe
sub_head: U.S., European authorities seize more $31 million in cash along with guns, drugs in 10-month operation stretching across nine countries
body:
The Justice Department and European police authorities said they arrested 150 people who sold and bought drugs and weapons on darknet forums, using evidence drawn from the worldâ€™s largest illegal online marketplace after it was taken down in January.
Authorities rounded up people in nine countries, including the U.S., the Netherlands, Australia and the U.K., and seized around 234 kilograms of drugs, 45 guns and more than $31.6 million in cash and virtual currencies.
